name: Spaghetti Carbonara
directions: Boil the spaghetti. Fry the bacon. Mix eggs and cheese, then add to the pasta. Add bacon. Serve with pepper.
description: A classic Italian pasta dish from Rome made with egg, hard cheese, cured pork, and black pepper.

name: Chicken Curry
directions: Fry the onions. Add chicken pieces. Add tomatoes and curry powder. Simmer until cooked.
description: A popular dish made with chicken pieces cooked in a spiced curry sauce.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
directions: Heat oil in a pan. Add garlic. Add and saut√© vegetables until slightly tender. Pour soy sauce and stir well. Serve hot.
description: A quick and colorful dish that can be served as a side or main. Packed with crunchy veggies and a simple stir fry sauce.

name: Cheeseburger
directions: Grill the beef patty until cooked to desired doneness. Place cheese on patty to melt. Toast the bun. Assemble the burger with lettuce, tomato, onions, and sauces.
description: A classic American fast-food dish. Juicy beef patty with melted cheese, served in a toasted bun with various toppings.
